sentences.chinese: 真核生物包羅其它一切生物。

sentences.english: In eukaryotes, the acetylation of histones was discovered many years ago.
sentences.chinese: 在真核生物中，很早就發現了組蛋白的乙酰化現象。

sentences.english: Archaeans have cell membranes that are completely different from both bacteria and eukaryotes.
sentences.chinese: 古生菌還具有完全與細菌和真核生物不同的細胞膜。

sentences.english: The RNA-coding sequences of eukaryotes can be interrupted with introns.
sentences.chinese: 真核生物的基因是具有內含子的割裂基因。

sentences.english: Simple Sequence Repeat is ubiquitous in prokaryotic and eukaryotic genomes.
sentences.chinese: 簡單重複序列廣泛分佈於原核和真核基因組。

sentences.english: Briefly describe the G capping reaction in eukaryotes.
sentences.chinese: 簡要描述真核生物的加帽反應。

sentences.english: A neutrophile peptide eucaryotic expression vector was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 構建了兔防禦素蛋白的真核表達載體。

sentences.english: Conlusion The human FHIT recombinant eukaryotic expression plasmid was constructed successfully.
sentences.chinese: 結論成功構建了重組人FHIT真核表達質粒。

sentences.english: The collective biological mass of prokaryotes is at least ten times that of all eukaryotes.
sentences.chinese: 原核生物集體生物大量是所有真核至少的十次。

sentences.english: Conclusion: The MAGE-3 fragment can be used in eukaryotic and prokaryotic gene expression.
sentences.chinese: 結論該片段可用於真核及原核表達。

sentences.english: All living cells can be classified as prokaryotic or eukaryotic .
sentences.chinese: 所有活細胞可以被劃分爲原核和真核兩類。

definition: everyone present/the whole audience/across-the-board/unanimously/whole duration (of a competition or match)
to replace (a damaged component with a new one, an injured player with a substitute player, full-time workers with casual workers etc)/a substitute/a replacement
